name: Surf-vival
description:
Surf-vival

During the hard times of c and vid, navigate through your life and complete tasks before the timer runs out.

It's game about managing our life in this new normality. 

Entry for the Gamerella 2020 Game Jam 

Made by
Daria Svechnikova - Design/Art
Egor Alexandrov - Developer
Sofia Nesterova - Concept
